column1: Highly affordable  was a key factor in initial purchase  Warranty very much considered as a premium value  Appearance  comfort of ride and roadability  Great selection of installed options  Economic to operate  We have experienced  three recalls to dealerships  Fuel filler neck would not accept fuel about the second week after we purchased the vehicle  Dealership where we purchased the vehicle  disassembled the right suspension  exhaust  and fuel tank and we made about 10 trips to different dealerships trying to get noises created by the repair of the fuel filler neck  We finally gave up and we now here the noise when we descend across a flaw in the surface the road bed br br
